Text: ...I really wanna get outta here...

Why am I the one doing undercover fieldwork?
I'm meant to be the behind-the-scenes type...
I've got research to do...

If you're gonna grumble so much, you should've just
turned it down from the get-go.

Well...it's 'cause Lady Alpha insisted... Besides...
there's the whole matter of my research funding...

Gotcha. So, you were dragged here against your will.
Well, as a fellow undercover agent, I appreciate the
help.

I don't plan on being helpful... *sigh* I just wanna
go back...

Here we go again... Why not try to make the best of
it instead of whining?

Since you're naturally curious, isn't there anything
here that draws your interest? It is a school, after
all.

School's a drag... The lessons are boring, and the
teachers nag me more than Gamma. I mean,
I already know everything they teach here...

And...there are students who won't leave me alone
even if I want them to. I got this weird thing from
one just now...
Weird thing?
This letter...
Can I read it?
Sure.
Let's see...hmm?  This isâ€•

"I want to confess these overwhelming emotions"...
"I'll be waiting behind the school after class"...

Ah, a classic love letter. You can't just ignore it.
You'll be misleading such innocent youth.
Okay...

Hey, come on, try to show a little more interest.
I'm sure it took a lot of courage to ask you to meet.

But...it makes no sense. Why ask to meet me?
And behind the school of all places. What a hassle...

It's probably to avoid prying eyes and to be alone
with you.
Avoid prying eyes...and be alone with me...

That's how confessions of love usually are.
Everyone finds it awkward to share their feelings.

Though, if they're pursuing you, getting stood up is
pretty much guaranteed. Poor thing.
...Maybe I should go.
...Huh?
Behind the school.

...What?! S-Seriously? Wait, are you actually into
this person?!

To think Eta, of all people, would develop feelings
for someone...or awaken to human feelings, in the
first place... How will I explain this to Lady Alphaâ€•

No, it's not like that... And for the record, I do
already have feelings...

That's debatable... But if not for love, what's your
angle?
A secluded area with just the two of us...

It's the perfect opportunity to snag a test subject
without anyone noticing...!
Ah, right, got it. That's your angle.

Now that I think about it, there's a whole school
full of potential test subjects... Even if a few go
missing, it shouldn't raise any alarms... Heheheh.

...Damn it. I steered her curiosity in the totally
wrong direction.

If I think about it that way...maybe school isn't so
dull after all!

Hey, you know you can't just go around kidnapping
students, right?
Heheheh...

And she's not even listening. Looks like I'll have
to keep an eye on her.

Time to act now before Lady Alpha finds out...
Heheheheh...!
